name: OR_IMP_3
description: The OR_IMP_3 table contains implant information.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the implant record.

columns.name: EXTRACARD_VLT
columns.description: This item stores the voltage measured for the extracardiac stimulation

columns.name: EXTRACARD_PULSE
columns.description: This item stores pulse width for the extracardiac stimulation

columns.name: PREVIOUS_OPERATION_LOCATION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the location where the previous surgery associated with this implant was performed.

columns.name: SUPPORT_NET_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether a support net was used for this implant. Y indicates that a support net was used. An N or null value indicates a support net was not used.

columns.name: SCREW_COUNT
columns.description: The count of screws used by this implant.

columns.name: SCREW_HOLE_C_NAME
columns.description: The screw hole category ID for the implant.

columns.name: CORE_PLUG_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether a core plug was used for this implant. Y indicates a core plug was used. An N or a null value indicates a core plug was not used.

columns.name: EAN_NUMBER
columns.description: Stores the European Article Number (EAN) for an implant.

columns.name: IMPLANT_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the source of the implant for the patient.

columns.name: PACEMAKER_AFFECT
columns.description: This free text item will allow the provider to document what will happen to the mode and rate when a magnet is placed.

columns.name: AICD_MAGNET_AFFECT
columns.description: This item is used to document what will happen when a magnet is placed properly.

columns.name: SEC_COUNTRY_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: The country identifier present in the Donation Identification Sequence of the Single European Code (SEC) for an implant.

columns.name: SEC_TISSUE_ESTABLISHMENT_CODE
columns.description: The tissue establishment code present in the Donation Identification Sequence of the Single European Code (SEC) for an implant.

columns.name: SEC_UNIQUE_DONATION_NUMBER
columns.description: The unique donation number present in the Donation Identification Sequence of the Single European Code (SEC) for an implant.

columns.name: SEC_CODING_SYSTEM_IDENTIFIER_C_NAME
columns.description: The coding system identifier present in the Production Identification Sequence of the Single European Code (SEC) for an implant.

columns.name: SEC_PRODUCT_CODE
columns.description: The product code present in the Production Identification Sequence of the Single European Code (SEC) for an implant.

columns.name: SEC_SPLIT_NUMBER
columns.description: The split number present in the Production Identification Sequence of the Single European Code (SEC) for an implant.

columns.name: FLOW_RATE
columns.description: Stores implant flow rate setting.

columns.name: PRESSURE
columns.description: Stores implant pressure setting.

columns.name: NUMBER_ACCESSORIES_USED
columns.description: This item stores the number of accessories used.

columns.name: IMPLANT_LENGTH
columns.description: This item stores the length of the implant.

columns.name: TISS_IMPL_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Instant that the tissue was implanted into the patient. Intended to be used with a third-party tissue tracking system.

columns.name: IMPLANT_BRAND_C_NAME
columns.description: The brand of the implantable device.

columns.name: CALIBRATION_DATE
columns.description: Date the implant or seed was calibrated or made radioactive.

columns.name: RADIOACTIVE_ACTIVITY
columns.description: The measured amount of radioactivity in the implant.

columns.name: NHR_LEAD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of lead, how this lead is used. Source: NHR

columns.name: EXPLANT_REPL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The explant replacement status.

columns.name: EXPLANT_REPL_IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The explant replacement ID.
